game.name: Eggstraordinary Goose Chase
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Not your everyday goose chase—this time, the goose is on the hunt! Sprint through vibrant levels, dodge obstacles, collect berries, stomp enemies, and take bold risks! Keep running, push your limits, and reclaim what’s yours!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Not your everyday goose chase—this time, the goose is on the hunt! Sprint through vibrant levels, dodge obstacles, collect berries, stomp enemies, and take bold risks! Keep running, push your limits, and reclaim what’s yours!
